body.p: At the request of Mr. C. F. Dyer I write to say that he was convicted at this Term of the Boyd Court for receiving Stolen property -- Other prisoners convicted were confined in jail with Dyer and the jail was broken -- Dyer, though at liberty and able to escape, failed to do so but surrendered himself although then under conviction. --
